citations.narrative:
The facility is not tracking animal deaths as disposition on facility records. This information is important to the
operation of the facility as it allows early identification of adverse trends. Such records including the relative age of
the animals can help the attending veterinarian in early diagnosis and treatment of disease. Correct this point
forward.
An exit briefing was conducted with the owner.

narrative:
2.75(b)(1)
RECORDS: DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS.
The facility is not tracking animal deaths as disposition on facility records. This information is important to the
operation of the facility as it allows early identification of adverse trends. Such records including the relative age of
the animals can help the attending veterinarian in early diagnosis and treatment of disease. Correct this point
forward.
An exit briefing was conducted with the owner.
